attributes.action: Resurface the Doohat Road, Derrynoose, Co Armagh
attributes.additional_details: We are a business on this road and customers and employees are refusing to drive their vehicles on this road as it is in such a bad state. As a company we are also out alot of capital due to damages of vehicles on this road.
attributes.background: To resurface/ fix/ tar the doohat road. As it is in very bad condition. The DFI has been contcted several times and nothing has been done and has siad there is no defects on this road.
